A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot\, character development and overt ideological sub-plots were so absurd\, so forced and so inept\, I wanted to rip my eyes out and plug my ears with them. The writers claimed they write a story and added characters. No wonder it failed. SW was always written around characters. The critics scores are in the 90's? Wow... Nothing says paid hacks like the discrepancy between the fans and the idiotic critics who are probably just paid by the industry to hold unfounded\, illogical \"opinions\". Also... Shame on the treatment of Mark Hamill's legacy\, Shame.
